select d.name,o.name as department_name from ark_uims_org_user_role t join ark_uims_org_employee d on t.user_id = d.id left join ark_uims_org_department o on d.department_id = o.id and o.is_deleted = 0 where t.role_id = #{query.id} and d.is_deleted = 0
and d.name like CONCAT('%',#{query.name},'%')
order by t.create_time asc
